messages.title: A message of hope for Calder Valley

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting the planet for future generations
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Urgent action needed on the environment, Labour is the only party to tackle the climate crisis.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rebuilding a health service which all can use
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will rebuild our health service, ending privatisation and putting the NHS back in public hands.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Rebuilding the economy with long-term investment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour’s long-term investment will rebuild our economy, creating well-paid, highly-skilled, unionised jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A well-run country enjoys well-run railways
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will take the railways back into public ownership, ending the costly private railways.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Why Labour can beat the Conservatives in Calder Valley’s 53rd seat. If everyone who wants to vote Labour in the hopes that we’re the party that can beat the Conservatives does vote Labour, we can create a victory.

issues.economy: Labour’s long-term investment will rebuild our economy, creating well-paid, highly-skilled, unionised jobs.
issues.environment: Urgent action needed on the environment, Labour is the only party to tackle the climate crisis.
issues.health: Labour will rebuild our health service, ending privatisation and putting the NHS back in public hands.

community.content: A message of hope for Calder Valley

leaflet.personalStatement: My pledges to you: A fairer society, A strong local economy, An NHS to be proud of, Creating decent jobs, Fighting climate change.

endorsements.endorsement: Josh Fenton-Glynn has the compassion and determination to be the MP Calder Valley deserves.
Josh has boundless energy and commitment to our area.

quotes.text: He works hard to labour up the headlines on good jobs, housing and transport, and doesn’t let down.
